title: Dark Souls III Release Date + Tokyo Game Show Gameplay Footage
content: 28 rate Dark Souls III Release Date + Tokyo Game Show Gameplay Footage 3 hours ago in News 0 Bandai Namco has confirmed the release month for their upcoming action role-playing game Dark Souls III. The game will be available on PC, PS4 and Xbox One in April 2016. kbell29 via gamefreaks365.com » | More Report!
